original_text: We must all die; we are like water spilled on the ground, which cannot be gathered up again. But God will not take away life, and he devises means so that the banished one will not remain an outcast.
korean_text: 우리는 필경 죽으리니 땅에 쏟아진 물을 다시 담지 못함 같을 것이오나 하나님은 생명을 빼앗지 아니하시고 방책을 베푸사 내쫓긴 자가 하나님께 버린 자가 되지 아니하게 하시나이다

sentences.original_text: we are like water spilled on the ground
which cannot be gathered up again
But God will not take away life
so that the banished one will not remain an outcast
sentences.korean_translation: 추방된 자가 버림받은 자로 남지 않도록
